name: Dioscartes
description:
Their fate is your decision

Dioscartes is a little interactive experience where you have to replace San Peter temporarily to choose the fate of five souls. They will talk about their lives and you will have a book with objective facts. Before taking the final decision  you can ask them only one question. 

Developed for the GameJam UA 2018.

Game in Spanish Developed bY:

Carlos Rizo Maciá - Programmer

Kiko Alfaro Moscardó -Programmer

Aurelio Puerta Martín -Programmer

Elena Gómez Debón -Artist

Victor Manuel Hernández Aldeguer - Narrative Designer
